#summary A summary of projects related to DOMD.

= Introduction =

This page summarises some other projects related to this one.  The idea of DOMD is to facilitate adoption of existing standards and encourage interoperation between them.

== Links ==
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_preservation Wikipedia: Digital Preservation].

= Metadata Standards =

 * Dublin Core
    * Note finding that [http://libtechissues.blogspot.com/2006/12/digital-preservation-using-oai-pmh-as.html dc.identifier is not an unambiguous identifier for that which should be preserved, as it may point to a derived representation].
 * [http://www.loc.gov/marc/ MARC] - Bibliographic, authority and related metadata.
 * [http://www.loc.gov/standards/mets/ METS] - a container/wrapper?
 * [http://www.loc.gov/standards/premis/ PREMIS] - Preservation metadata.
 * [http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/ MODS] - Metadata Object Description Schema (relations?)
 * [http://rfc.net/rfc1807.html RFC 1807] - Bibliographic metadata.
 * [http://libraries.mit.edu/guides/subjects/metadata/standards/onix.html ONIX]#
 * [http://libraries.mit.edu/guides/subjects/metadata/standards.html MIT Selected Metadata Standards] and notes therein contain lots of information.  There are clearly metadata standards for different classes of data and metadata.
   * [http://www.loc.gov/standards/mix/ Z39.87 Data dictionary - Technical Metadata for Digital Still Images (MIX)]

[http://stephesblog.blogs.com/my_weblog/2008/04/a-standards-pri.html A Standards Primer - Understanding Technology Standardization Efforts].

= Digital Object Sources =

  * The file system.
  * Content Management Systems
    * [http://www.alfresco.com/ Alfresco] (embedded by Adobe)
    * [http://www.fedora-commons.org/documentation/3.0b1/userdocs/digitalobjects/objectModel.html Fedora]
    * Anything with an OAI-PMH interface (see below).

== Content Access Prototols ==
The pipes that make the sources work.

 * [http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html OAI-PMH], see [http://xml.coverpages.org/oams.html this overview].
    * [http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/1.0/openarchivesprotocol.htm#appendix%201 Attaching DC, RFC 1807 or MARC metadata]
 * [AtomPub]
    * [http://atomserver.codehaus.org/index.html AtomServer], [http://www.infoq.com/articles/atomserver AtomServer article], APL
    * [http://incubator.apache.org/abdera/ Apache Abdera] APL
    * [http://code.google.com/p/atomojo/ Atomojo server & client] NBSD
    * [http://www.tbray.org/ongoing/When/200x/2008/07/07/Atom atom-multipart]
